name: Intersect
description:
How to Play

Your aim is to colour as much area as possible by blocking it off from the evil(?) coloured balls.

This is done by drawing lines from and to other lines. But be careful- if a ball hits the line you are drawing you will lose!

In order to complete a level you must take a certain percentage of the area and separate balls of different colours from each other.

Play for as long as you can without getting hit then upload your score to the Global Top 10 Leaderboard!

Controls

Left click on a line to begin drawing a new line.
Left click on another line to complete the new line.

Spacebar - Advance to the next level

Other Information

The leaderboard is done using a nodejs webserver with a mongoDB database for storing/retrieving leaderboard information.
